prompts.title: 2Flowers
prompts.body: Make a bouquet of flowers with pens. Hand them to your partner.

prompts.title: Life Gives Lemons
prompts.body: Draw them on a piece of paper. Give that drawing to somebody. Tell them, "Life gave you lemons"

prompts.title: Spirit Animals
prompts.body: Draw your spirit animal on a small piece of paper. Pass it to the person to the left of you.

prompts.title: Thoughtful Numbers
prompts.body: Say it out loud.

prompts.title: Shake Hands
prompts.body: Shake hands with somebody in the room.

prompts.title: modern art
prompts.body: What do you think of modern art?

prompts.title: Box
prompts.body: You open a box. What's in it?

prompts.title: drum
prompts.body: Drum roll some pens.

prompts.title: emotion
prompts.body: What emotion does this image give you?

prompts.title: hello
prompts.body: From where you're standing, greet the presenters in an unusual way.

prompts.title: knock
prompts.body: Knock on any surface.

prompts.title: barter
prompts.body: Barter with somebody near you.

prompts.title: giraffe
prompts.body: Discuss with anyone about the possibility of giraffes being too tall

prompts.title: portrait
prompts.body: Get someone to draw your portrait.

prompts.title: animal
prompts.body: Sound like a farm animal.

prompts.title: commonCliche
prompts.body: Say out loud a goofy common cliche.

prompts.title: ickyColor
prompts.body: Say out loud your least favorite color.

prompts.title: painting
prompts.body: There's a painting on the wall. What is it?

prompts.title: spin
prompts.body: Spin in a circle 5 times.

prompts.title: greet
prompts.body: Greet somebody as if they are the queen.

prompts.title: autograph
prompts.body: You're a celebrity. Give somebody your autograph.

prompts.title: sun
prompts.body: You are the sun. Tell the world!

prompts.title: colorFlash
prompts.body: Red. Blue. Yellow.

prompts.title: tent
prompts.body: Make a tent.

prompts.title: finger
prompts.body: Perform with finger(s).
